narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Reflection Health Services L.l.c. is a Psychiatric Residential Treatment Facility provider based in Phoenix, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $25.1M in Medicaid payments across 44K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $25.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
